snippet.title: Saban's Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers: Mega Battle - Launch Trailer | PS4, X1 '
snippet.description:
Saban's Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Mega Battle is finally here on PS4 and Xbox One!  Check out the launch trailer for the game but be sure to waste no time teaming up with your friends to fight evil Rita Repulsa and her army of warriors! http://bit.ly/2iyMVjb


Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
